definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: A position as data-processing manager that will accredit me to utilize my ability of computer systems.
sentences.chinese: 資料處理經理的職務，能保障我運用電腦系統的常識。

sentences.english: Has a thorough knowledge to all sides of MICROS System.
sentences.chinese: 對MICROS電腦系統的各方面都要全面瞭解。

sentences.english: I hate all computer system here, it is so so slow for Chinese system.
sentences.chinese: 我討厭這裏電腦系統，因打開一箇中文網太慢了。

sentences.english: All company computer system fault, YiZhong and YiXin to to filial piety.
sentences.chinese: 公司電腦系統全部故障，毅忠及毅信向至孝追究。

sentences.english: Why do I have to obtain and transmit the data to PSB every night?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼每天晚上要把數據傳輸到公安局電腦系統中？

sentences.english: Because we should make improvements in company's computer system to make our work effiency.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我們要提高公司電腦系統是我們的工作更有效。

sentences.english: A position as data-processing manager that will enable me to use my knowledge of computer systems.
sentences.chinese: 數據處理經理的職務，能保證我運用電腦系統的知識。

sentences.english: Last week the board of directors authorized the installation of a new puter.
sentences.chinese: 上星期董事會授權安裝一個新的電腦系統。

sentences.english: We noticed a wead spot in our computer system.
sentences.chinese: 我們發現電腦系統有缺陷。

sentences.english: Mr. darren tam, principal consultant, techland computer system ltd, and.
sentences.chinese: 科域電腦系統有限公司首席顧問譚建中先生及。

definition: out of order (of machine)/not working properly/a failing (of a system)
to steal (including identity theft, credit card fraud or theft of computer account)/to misappropriate
to break the rules/to violate regulations
to lend money (for interest)/to give credit
